1016860.name: Boiling Steel
1016860.description:
The story for “Boiling Steel” was written by one of the authors of S.T.A.L.K.E.R. series.

According to the plot you are one of many who set off in search of a better life in the distant bastion of scientific progress. Your goal is a colony planet, free from bureaucratic, religious and other radical restrictions. It is a high-tech paradise. But here, something went wrong…

Reach the final to know what’s happened.


The action of the game takes place on a planet-colony in biomes, different in climatic and biological features and locations, unique in their content.

More than 40 combat missions, each of which unfolds on a unique map - from the cloud-city complexes and sandy mining platforms to the permafrost zone and science camps.


11 different tools with the original mechanic of two-handed grip allow the player to choose their own playing style.
The stripping cutter (like a lightsaber sword) and the fisticuffs are also in your arsenal.
The weapon upgrade system automatically improves a favorite and frequently used tool, gradually turning it into a hellish machine.


A number of additional abilities increase your combat effectiveness. Among those:
  • clone
  • superspeed
  • defense matrix
  • electromagnetic wave
  • plasma stripping system
